title: cafter
author: cafter
content: Today i want wasting time on instagram and after some swipes a ad came out of "making money from gambling" and i clicked it and the link was going to telegram channel, where the owner was giving referral link to register at a low rating casino, (he was ghasiting people in gambling who don't gamble by giving lalach of making money which is dangerous) and the reviews are also bad and also the casnio accepts crypto or only bitcoin as payment methods. so stay away from these type of scam and scammy type websites. if you are already a gambler then you can register from the forums trusted crypto casinos.here the images and reviews :
